candidates.title: Upgrade-athon
candidates.body: Wow. Finally was able to Electron/Spectron. That was a long running headache.

candidates.title: Scope
candidates.body: Adds a more extensible concept of scope to WereSoCool.

candidates.title: Lambdas
Switch from failure to thiserror for Error Handling
candidates.body: Ended up being a super simple refactor.

candidates.title: Wasm/Cpal
candidates.body: Adds a wasm feature leveraging Cpal.

candidates.title: Polynomials
candidates.body:
This PR adds polynomials to Generators.
```
*(
  f: 0|12 Poly [1, 1, -1/10],
  l: 1|10 Poly [0, 1]
) 
Take 10
```

candidates.title: Checked Mul
candidates.body: Fixed Rational64 overflow using CheckedMul. Not doing the same check with addition, but may have to add the same logic for addition if I encounter issues.

candidates.title: Reverb
candidates.body:
Adds Reverb 
```
Reverb 1 | Sine 3 | Fm 9/8
```
Fixes Editor layout when small.

candidates.title: Sine Powers
candidates.body:
Sine operation now takes a value which `p` to apply sin(sample^p) creating distortion in the signal.

```
  Overlay [
    Sine 1.5,
    Sine 3.5 | Gm 1/3,
    Sine 5.0 | Gm 1/7,
  ] |
  Seq [
    O[
      (3/2, 0, 1, -1),
      (1/1, 0, 1, -1),
      (3/4, 0, 1, 1),
      (1/2, 0, 1, 1),
    ]
    | Seq [
       Seq [Pm -3/4, Pm 3/4] 
       | Repeat 3,
       Seq [Pm -3/2, Pm 3/2] 
       | Repeat 1,
       Seq [Pm -7/4, Pm 7/4] 
       | Repeat 3,
       Seq [Pm -1, Pm 1] 
       | Fa -2
       | Repeat 2
       | Lm 3/2
    ]
  ]
  | Gm 1/5
  > FitLength thing1
}
```

candidates.title: Imports in Application
candidates.body: Adds imports from working directory in application.
